EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This email is in response to your request for accessing Salesforce.
You have been granted a salesforce license.
You must activate this login within 24 hours of receiving this email.
What you must do? To activate your Salesforce license please follow these instructions while logging in:
1. Open Google Chrome and navigate to https://ihsmarkit.my.salesforce.com
2. Login with Single Sign-On by entering your Username and password - this will be the same as your IHS Markit email and the Desktop password you use to login
IHS Markit Salesforce Helpdesk contact details Please reach out to Salesforce Helpdesk for any further queries or assistance at salesforce@ihsmarkit.com.
For training material, you can visit the links below: Training Link.
​​​​​​​We work proactively in resolving all the salesforce-related queries of our users.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Configuration Team
